name: BLACK CURRANT PRINT MEN'S RESORT SHIRT
description: Set out on a voyage to exotic destinations with our Black Currant Print Resort Shirt,seamlessly melding contemporary flair with timeless sophistication. Made from high-quality polyester, this shirt offers a sumptuously soft feel against the skin,ensuring all-day comfort. The short sleeves ensure breathability and freedom of movement, perfect for warmer climates and leisurely pursuits.
